description: Searches SOP knowledge base for applicable dispute policies and compliance rules

applicable_policies.description: Governs handling of disputes related to transactions the cardholder claims they did not authorize.
applicable_policies.applies_because: Sample research involves a test of common dispute types; unauthorized transaction is a primary use case for standard operating procedures testing.

compliance_rules.rule_description: Cardholder must provide affirmation of non-authorization for disputed transaction.
compliance_rules.threshold: Written or verbal affidavit required within 15 days of claim initiation.

compliance_rules.rule_description: Transaction must be reported within 60 days of statement issuance.

auto_approve_conditions: Affidavit of non-authorization received and transaction reported within 60 days of statement.
auto_deny_conditions: Cardholder cannot provide affirmation OR dispute reported after 60-day window.
manual_review_conditions: Ambiguous transaction history or partial cardholder documentation.

policy_citations: Section 2.4.2 of POL-3201: Timely Filing of Disputes
